root.name: code_18
root.description: code_18 is a Japanese science-fiction visual novel produced by CyberFront and released on September 29, 2011 for the PlayStation Portable and Xbox 360.Unlike the rest of the Infinity series, Code_18 had no involvement from either Takumi Nakazawa or Kotaro Uchikoshi, the director and main writers of the rest of the series. Instead, it was written by Chabo Higurashi.
